original_text: “Make two trumpets of hammered silver, and use them for calling the community together and for having the camps set out.
korean_text: 은 나팔 둘을 만들되 두들겨 만들어서 그것으로 회중을 소집하며 진영을 출발하게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Make two trumpets of hammered silver,
sentences.korean_translation: 두 개의 망치로 두드려 만든 은 나팔을 만드라

sentences.original_text: and use them for calling the community together
and for having the camps set out.
